plot: Imagine if the bungled robbery in Reservoir Dogs was carried out by a collection of incompetent (and blind) thieves. That's Reservoir Guide Dogs - a spoof that aims to send up Tarantino's classic.
title: Reservoir Guide Dogs
plot_es: Imagine if the bungled robbery in Reservoir Dogs was carried out by a collection of incompetent (and blind) thieves. That's Reservoir Guide Dogs - a spoof that aims to send up Tarantino's classic.
plot_en: Imagine if the bungled robbery in Reservoir Dogs was carried out by a collection of incompetent (and blind) thieves. That's Reservoir Guide Dogs - a spoof that aims to send up Tarantino's classic.
